snippet: With the 2017 model year, all 911s are turbocharged, a change that loyalists may approach with trepidation.
abstract: Driven column review of 2017 Porsche 911 Carrera S Cabriolet.
lead_paragraph: With the 2017 model year, all 911s are turbocharged, a change that loyalists may approach with trepidation.

headline.print_headline: The Porsche 911, Redesigned and Revved Up
headline.main: Video Review: Porsche 911 Redesign Is Revved Up
